metadata.Title: CVE-2016-0816 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - high.
metadata.Description:
mediaserver in Android 6.x before 2016-03-01 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption) via a crafted media file, related to decoder/ih264d_parse_islice.c and decoder/ih264d_parse_pslice.c, aka internal bug 25928803.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-0816` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

android - 20160307-0742-0ubuntu3
android-copyright - 20160307-0742-0ubuntu3
android-emulator - 20160307-0742-0ubuntu3
ubuntu-emulator-images - 20160307-0742-0ubuntu3
ubuntu-emulator-runtime - 20160307-0742-0ubuntu3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: android package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '20160307-0742-0ubuntu3').
